name: Sally the Sad (and Lost) Flower
description: Have you ever felt lost looking for a place to fit in? Have you felt surrounded by those who make you feel judged and afraid? That's how Sally the sad flower feels in this overwhelming big city that she unexpectedly woke up in. Help her find her way around this world with large buildings, tornados, and unfriendly faces in order to find a place where she belongs and a home that will protect her from the storms and judgmental faces in the city. Be the hero of Sally's story and put an end to her nonstop crying.
